web_page.description: Device: N5 Channel: Xenial Build: 389 Steps to reproduce Just take a picture Expected behavior no freeze Actual behavior The image in the camera app freezes, blocking to take another picture. Video...
web_page.title: [xenial] Camera app image freeze · Issue #611 · ubports/ubuntu-touch

text.text:
Probably this https://github.com/ubports/ubuntu-touch/issues/611
Workaround: take a picture, slide to "deck of cards" or "shuffle view" or whatever that's called 😅 then tap on the camera app window again and you can take another picture.
Rinse and repeat 😉
